name: Nova

background.notes: Nova is a Cacophony whose crystalline body resonates with musical tones that can shatter glass or soothe savage beasts. Growing up as a Shankling, they learned to harmonize with the forest's natural rhythms before taking to the sea. As a Spit-Lyre, they use their sonic abilities both in performance and combat, their body singing with different frequencies depending on their mood. Their crystalline features catch and refract light, creating beautiful prismatic displays during their performances.

drives:
Perform before a legendary audience
Discover a lost song of power
Bring harmony to a discordant situation

mires.label: Your emotions create unwanted sound effects
You speak in musical metaphors others don't understand

aspects.name: Sonic Resonance (Traits) - Cacophony
aspects.details: Your crystalline body can produce devastating sound waves. Mark to deal LR Blast damage or shatter fragile objects.

aspects.name: Harmonic Healing (Traits) - Cacophony
aspects.details: Your melodic tones can mend wounds and calm minds. Mark to heal aspects or remove negative conditions from allies.

aspects.name: Performance Magic (Traits) - Spit-Lyre
aspects.details: Your musical performances can influence emotions and actions. Mark to gain advantage on social interactions after a performance.

aspects.name: Forest Harmony (Traits) - Shankling
aspects.details: Your connection to natural rhythms helps you navigate wild places. Gain advantage when traveling through forests or natural environments.

aspects.name: Crystal Lyre (Gear) - Spit-Lyre
aspects.details: A musical instrument that amplifies your sonic abilities. Mark to enhance the power of your Cacophony traits or create complex musical effects.

aspects.name: Resonance Crystals (Gear) - Cacophony
aspects.details: Small crystals that store and replay sounds. Mark to record a sound, voice, or song for later playback.

aspects.name: Totally Normal Sword
aspects.details: Roll flourish to deal CQ damage (no need to mark). Roll flourish to absorb damage from another sword.

aspects.name: Totally Normal Flintlock
aspects.details: Mark and roll flourish to deal LR damage. Reload: spend an action to unmark.
